dependencies.description:
A cross-language development platform for in-memory data. This package
contains the C++ bindings.
dependencies.name: arrow

dependencies.description:
Chapel is a modern programming language that is parallel, productive,
portable, scalable and open-source. The Chapel package comes with many
options in the form of variants, most of which can be left unset to
allow Chapel's built-in scripts to determine the proper values based on
the environment.
dependencies.name: chapel

dependencies.description:
A cross-platform, open-source build system. CMake is a family of tools
designed to build, test and package software.
dependencies.name: cmake

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
dependencies.name: hdf5

dependencies.description:
GNU libiconv provides an implementation of the iconv() function and the
iconv program for character set conversion.
dependencies.name: libiconv

dependencies.description:
Libidn2 is a free software implementation of IDNA2008, Punycode and
TR46. Its purpose is to encode and decode internationalized domain
names.
dependencies.name: libidn2

dependencies.description: The ZMQ networking/concurrency library and core API
dependencies.name: libzmq

description:
Arkouda is a NumPy-like library for distributed data with a focus on
large-scale data science applications.
name: arkouda

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Build Arkouda for multi-locale execution on a cluster or supercomputer
variants.name: distributed
